name: SayHelp
description:
A game you play by reading and speaking. 

In the center of the pine wood called Coilla Doraca there lived not long

ago two Philosophers. They were wiser than anything else in the world

except the Salmon who lies in the pool of Glyn Cagny into which the nuts

of knowledge fall from the hazel bush on its bank.

Game Controls: 

  • Eye tracking device to look around
  • Or Mouse to control the eye tracker cursor 
  • Speak available commands or what you think makes sense
